00028 //usage: <a href="javascript:postData('target.php',{'name':'value', 'name2':'value2'});">
00029 function postData(address, parameters) {
00030   var myForm = document.createElement("form");
00031   myForm.method = "post";
00032   myForm.action = address;
00033   for (name in parameters) {
00034     var myInput = document.createElement("input");
00035     myInput.setAttribute("name", name);
00036     myInput.setAttribute("value", parameters[name]);
00037     myForm.appendChild(myInput);
00038   }
00039   document.body.appendChild(myForm) ;
00040   myForm.submit() ;
00041   document.body.removeChild(myForm) ;
00042 }

00063             thiss.loginEmail.focus(); // focus the email input field
00064         });
00065         
00066         return false;
00067     });

00071 
00072         return false;
00073     });    
00074 }

00085 function BehaviorCookies(){
00086     var behavior = BehaviorCookies.get();
00087     if (behavior != null){
00088         Behavior.send(behavior); // send cookies to the server
00089         BehaviorCookies.remove(); // and delete them
00090     }
00091 }
00092 
00099 BehaviorCookies.set = function(productID, scrollCount, clickCount, displayTime,
00100                                 displayCount){
00101 
00103     var cookieLifeTime = 30;
00104 
00105     $.cookie('productID', productID, {'expires': cookieLifeTime});
00106     $.cookie('scrollCount', scrollCount, {'expires': cookieLifeTime});
00107     $.cookie('clickCount', clickCount, {'expires': cookieLifeTime});
00108     $.cookie('displayTime', displayTime, {'expires': cookieLifeTime});
00109     $.cookie('displayCount', displayCount, {'expires': cookieLifeTime});
00110 };
00111 
00116 BehaviorCookies.get = function(){
00117     var productID = $.cookie('productID');
00118     if (productID != null && productID != '' && productID > 0){
00119         return {"productID" : productID,
00120                 "scrollCount" : $.cookie('scrollCount'),
00121                 "clickCount" : $.cookie('clickCount'),
00122                 "displayTime" : $.cookie('displayTime'),
00123                 "displayCount" : $.cookie('displayCount')};
00124     }
00125     return null;
00126 };
00127 
00131 BehaviorCookies.remove = function(){
00132     $.cookie('productID', null);
00133     $.cookie('scrollCount', null);
00134     $.cookie('clickCount', null);
00135     $.cookie('displayTime', null);
00136     $.cookie('displayCount', null);    
00137 };

00150 function TabSwitching (){
00151     var thiss = this;
00152 
00154     this.tabs = $('.tab');
00155 
00157     this.switches = $('#switches a'); 
00158 
00160     this.currentIndex = 0; 
00161 
00162     this.switches.each(function(index){
00163         $(this).click(function(){
00164             thiss.switches.eq(thiss.currentIndex).removeClass('selected');
00165             thiss.tabs.eq(thiss.currentIndex).hide();
00166             thiss.currentIndex = index;
00167             thiss.switches.eq(thiss.currentIndex).addClass('selected');
00168             thiss.tabs.eq(thiss.currentIndex).show();
00169             return false;
00170         });
00171 
00172     }).first().click(); // select first tab in the beginning
00173 
00174 }

00195 function Rating(rating, maxRating, productID, userLogged){
00196     var thiss = this;
00197 
00199     this.productID = productID;
00201     this.userLogged = userLogged;
00203     this.rating = rating;
00204 
00206     this.starWidth = 20;
00207 
00209     this.starsF = $('#starsFull');
00210     
00211     // sets the width of full stars
00212     // this way even fractions of stars can be "highlighted"
00213     this.starsF.css('width', Math.round(this.starWidth * rating));
00214 
00215     // set width of empty stars
00216     $('#rating').css('width', Math.round(this.starWidth * maxRating));
00217 
00218     if (this.userLogged){
00219 
00221         this.starsCh = $('#starsChoose');
00222 
00224         this.helpingStars = $('#helpingStars');
00225 
00226         $('#rating').mouseleave(function(){ // when user leaves rating div
00227             thiss.starsCh.css('width', 0);
00228             thiss.starsF.show();
00229         }).find('.star').each(function(i){  // when user moves mouse of the
00230             $(this).mouseenter(function(){  // last layer (helping stars)
00231                 thiss.starsF.hide();
00232                 thiss.starsCh.css('width', (i + 1)* thiss.starWidth);
00233                 // alter width of Choose Stars (this way no star fractions)
00234             });
00235             $(this).click(function(){ //when user clicks it, ajax-send the rating
00236                 //temporarily hide all the layers, so that event are not fired
00237                 $('#coverLayer').show();
00238                 //thiss.helpingStars.css('width', 0);
00239 
00240                 // hide Choose Stars layer
00241                 thiss.starsCh.css('width', 0);
00242                 // set the Full Stars layer to new value
00243                 thiss.starsF.css('width', (i + 1)* thiss.starWidth).show();
00244                 // send rating to the server
00245                 $.post("php/ajax/rating.php",
00246                 {
00247                     "productID": thiss.productID,
00248                     "rating": (i + 1)
00249                 },
00250                 function(){
00251                     // now user can send other ratings again
00252                     $('#coverLayer').hide();
00253                     //thiss.helpingStars.css('width', 100);
00254                 }
00255                 );
00256             });
00257         });
00258     }else{
00259         $('#rating').click(function(){ // guest users cannot rate products
00260             alert("Please sign in to rate products.");
00261         });
00262 
00263     }
00264 
00265 }

00340 function Behavior(productID){
00341     var thiss = this;
00342 
00345     this.SEND_INFO_OFTEN = false || $.browser.opera;
00346 
00347     //EDIT: set even opera no to use this (use cookies instead)
00348     this.SEND_INFO_OFTEN = false;
00349 
00351     this.INFO_INTERVAL = 5000;
00352 
00357     this.infoBeenSent = false;
00358 
00363     this.USE_BEHAVIOR_COOKIES = true;
00364 
00368     this.USE_ONUNLOAD = false;
00369 
00371     this.COOKIES_INTERVAL = 100;
00372 
00374     this.cookiesTimer = null;
00375 
00380     this.MAX_DISPLAY_TIME = 1000 * 60 * 5; // five minutes
00381 
00383     this.productID = productID;
00384 
00386     this.scrollCount = 0;
00387 
00390     this.lastScrollTop = 0;
00391 
00393     this.clickCount = 0;
00394 
00396     this.timeFocused = new Date().valueOf();
00397 
00399     this.displayTime = 0;
00400 
00402     this.focused = true;
00403 
00406     this.bookmarked = false;
00407 
00412     this.mouseMove = 0;
00413 
00414     // when user scrolls the page
00415     $(window).scroll(function(){
00416         //thiss.scrollCount ++; // not precise (browsers don't fire the event as often)
00417         // it is better to count pixels
00418         var currentScrollTop = $(window).scrollTop();
00419         thiss.scrollCount += Math.abs(currentScrollTop - thiss.lastScrollTop);
00420         thiss.lastScrollTop = currentScrollTop;
00421     });
00422 
00423     // record all click to links (tab switches, images, ...)
00424     $('#main a').click(function(){
00425         thiss.clickCount ++;
00426     });
00427 
00428     // if window is blurred (user goes to another tab or leaves the browser),
00429     // stop counting time
00430     $(window).blur(function(){
00431         if (!thiss.focused)
00432             return;
00433         thiss.focused = false;
00434         thiss.displayTime += new Date().valueOf() - thiss.timeFocused;
00435     });
00436 
00437     // when focused, start counting time again
00438     $(window).focus(function(){
00439         if (thiss.focused)
00440             return;
00441         thiss.focused = true;
00442         thiss.timeFocused = new Date().valueOf();
00443     });
00444 
00445     // send info about behavior to server when user is leaving the page
00446     if (this.USE_ONUNLOAD){
00447         //set onUnload cookie for server to know that onUnload has been used
00448         $.cookie('onUnload', 1);
00449 
00450         $(window).unload(function(){
00451             // disable cookies timer first
00452             if (thiss.USE_BEHAVIOR_COOKIES){
00453                 clearInterval(thiss.cookiesTimer);
00454             }
00455             // send the behavior
00456             thiss.sendInfo();
00457         });
00458     }
00459 
00460     
00461     // send info directly to server every certain amount of time
00462     if (this.SEND_INFO_OFTEN){
00463         window.setInterval(function() {
00464             thiss.sendInfo();
00465             }, this.INFO_INTERVAL);
00466     }
00467     
00468     // save behavior cookies every certain amount of time
00469     if (this.USE_BEHAVIOR_COOKIES){
00470         this.cookiesTimer = window.setInterval(function() {
00471             thiss.setBehaviorCookies();
00472             }, this.COOKIES_INTERVAL);
00473 
00474         $(window).unload(function(){
00475             thiss.setBehaviorCookies();
00476         });
00477 
00478     }
00479 }
00480 
00483 Behavior.prototype.countDisplayTime = function(){
00484     // if window is focused, displayTime has increased since last call
00485     if (this.focused){
00486         var time = new Date().valueOf();
00487         this.displayTime += time - this.timeFocused;
00488         this.timeFocused = time;
00489     }
00490 
00491     // check if maximum display time was reached
00492     if (this.displayTime > this.MAX_DISPLAY_TIME){
00493         this.displayTime = this.MAX_DISPLAY_TIME;
00494     }
00495 }
00496 
00501 Behavior.prototype.sendInfo = function (){
00502     var thiss = this; // jquery changes scope of 'this'
00503 
00504     this.countDisplayTime();
00505 
00506     // if there's nothing to send, return
00507     // makes more sense when SEND_INFO_OFTEN
00508     if (this.displayTime == 0 && this.scrollCount == 0 && this.clickCount == 0)
00509         return;
00510 
00511     //if info has been sent using ajax (thanks to SEND_INFO_OFTEN),
00512     //don't increment displayCount again
00513     var displayCount = this.infoBeenSent ? 0 : 1;
00514     this.infoBeenSent = true;
00515 
00516     // send all the info to the server    
00517     Behavior.send(
00518         {
00519             "productID": thiss.productID,
00520             "scrollCount": thiss.scrollCount,
00521             "clickCount": thiss.clickCount,
00522             "displayTime": thiss.displayTime,
00523             "displayCount": displayCount
00524         }
00525     );
00526 
00527     // remove cookies now
00528     // if this is during onUnload, timer has been disabled already
00529         
00530     BehaviorCookies.remove(); // nothing happens if they don't exist    
00531 
00532     /*alert("scrollCount " + thiss.scrollCount +
00533             "\n clickCount " + thiss.clickCount +
00534             "\n displayTime " + thiss.displayTime);*/
00535 
00536     // reset all values (make sense only if SEND_INFO_OFTEN
00537     this.displayTime = 0;
00538     this.scrollCount = 0;
00539     this.clickCount = 0;
00540 }
00541 
00546 Behavior.prototype.setBehaviorCookies = function(){
00547     this.countDisplayTime();
00548     var displayCount = this.infoBeenSent ? 0 : 1; //if info has been sent
00549     //using ajax (thanks to SEND_INFO_OFTEN), don't increment displayCount again
00550 
00551     BehaviorCookies.set(this.productID, this.scrollCount, this.clickCount, 
00552                         this.displayTime, displayCount);
00553 
00554 }
00555 
00560 Behavior.send = function(behavior){
00561     $.post("php/ajax/behavior.php", behavior);
00562 }

00573 function Comments(productID){
00574     var thiss = this;
00575 
00577     this.MAX_TEXT_LENGTH = 512;
00578 
00580     this.productID = productID;
00581 
00583     this.button = $('#addComment');
00584 
00586     this.text = $('#commentText');
00587 
00588     // enabling/disabling the Add comment button and limiting length of the text
00589     function textareaHandler(text){
00590         if (text.value.length > thiss.MAX_TEXT_LENGTH){
00591             text.value = text.value.substring(0, thiss.MAX_TEXT_LENGTH);
00592         }
00593 
00594         thiss.button[0].disabled = text.value == "";
00595     }
00596     
00597     this.text.keyup(function(){        
00598         textareaHandler(this);
00599     });
00600     this.text.change(function(){
00601         textareaHandler(this);
00602     });
00603 
00604     //send comment using ajax, add it to the page and scroll so that user can see it
00605     this.button.click(function(){
00606         this.disabled = true;
00607         $.post("php/ajax/addComment.php",
00608         {
00609             "productID": thiss.productID,
00610             "text": thiss.text.val()
00611         }
00612         , function(data){
00613             $('#commentForm').parent().prepend(data).each(function(){
00614                     // count new comment's offset
00615                     var newOffset = $(this).offset().top - 100;
00616                     
00617                     /* ScrollObject is an object that will be scrolled.
00618                      * Some browsers need 'html' to be scrolled, others need
00619                      * 'body'. No browser minds if both elements are used, except
00620                      * for Opera, which would scroll "twice".
00621                      */
00622                     var scrollObject = $.browser.opera ? $('html') : $('html, body');
00623 
00624                     scrollObject.animate({scrollTop: newOffset}, 500); // use animation
00625             });
00626             thiss.text.val(""); // clear the textarea
00627         });
00628 
00629     });
00630 
00631 
00632 }

00641 function PageNumbers (formPosition){
00642     var thiss = this;
00643 
00645     this.form = $('#controlsForm' + formPosition);
00646 
00648     this.pageNumbers = this.form.find('.pageNumbers');
00649 
00651     this.toLeft = this.form.find('.toLeft');
00652 
00654     this.toRight = this.form.find('.toRight');
00655 
00657     this.toBeginning = this.form.find('.toBeginning');
00658 
00660     this.toEnd = this.form.find('.toEnd');
00661 
00663     this.scrollStep = 70;
00664 
00666     this.currentPageNoOffset = 60;
00667 
00668     // scroll page numbers so that currentPageNoOffset is satisfied
00669     this.pageNumbers.scrollLeft(this.form.find('.currentPageNo').offset().left
00670         - this.pageNumbers.offset().left - this.currentPageNoOffset);
00671 
00672     // assign events to the buttons
00673     this.toLeft.click(function(){
00674         thiss.scroll(-1, false);        
00675     });
00676     this.toRight.click(function(){
00677         thiss.scroll(1, false);
00678     });
00679     this.toBeginning.click(function(){
00680         thiss.scroll(-1, true);
00681     });
00682     this.toEnd.click(function(){
00683         thiss.scroll(1, true);
00684     });
00685 
00686     // hide/show some of the buttons
00687     this.checkBorders();
00688 }
00689 
00690 
00698 PageNumbers.prototype.scroll = function (direction, allTheWay){
00699     var thiss = this;
00700     
00701     if (allTheWay)
00702         if (direction < 0)            
00703             this.pageNumbers.animate({scrollLeft: 0}, 1000, function(){
00704                 thiss.checkBorders();
00705             });
00706         else            
00707             this.pageNumbers.animate({scrollLeft: this.pageNumbers[0].scrollWidth},
00708                                      1000, function(){
00709                 thiss.checkBorders();
00710             });
00711             // the [0] (or get(0)) returns DOM node from the jQuery object
00712     else{        
00713         this.pageNumbers.animate({scrollLeft: '+=' + (this.scrollStep * direction)},
00714                                  300, function(){
00715                 thiss.checkBorders();
00716             });
00717     }    
00718 };
00719 
00727 PageNumbers.prototype.checkBorders = function(){
00728     if (this.pageNumbers.scrollLeft() == 0){
00729         this.toLeft.css('visibility', 'hidden');
00730         this.toBeginning.css('visibility', 'hidden');
00731     }else{
00732         this.toLeft.css('visibility', 'visible');
00733         this.toBeginning.css('visibility', 'visible');
00734     }
00735     if (this.pageNumbers[0].clientWidth >= this.pageNumbers[0].scrollWidth ||
00736             this.pageNumbers[0].scrollWidth == this.pageNumbers.scrollLeft() + this.pageNumbers[0].clientWidth){
00737         this.toRight.css('visibility', 'hidden');
00738         this.toEnd.css('visibility', 'hidden');
00739     }else{
00740         this.toRight.css('visibility', 'visible');
00741         this.toEnd.css('visibility', 'visible');
00742     }
00743 };

00753 function CartControls(){
00754     var thiss = this;
00755 
00757     this.rightButton = $('#main .button.fright');
00758 
00760     this.loading = $('#loadingGif');
00761 
00762     // for tds to have fixed height and for animation of their hiding
00763     $('table.cart td').wrapInner("<div />");
00764 
00765     // user changes quantity of an item
00766     $('input.quantity').change(function(){
00767         thiss.sendChange(this, this.value);
00768     });
00769 
00770     // when user clicks 'Continue Order', just show order preferences
00771     $('#submitButton').click(function(){
00772         // change buttons caption to 'Submit order'
00773         $(this).html('Submit order').click(function(){
00774             // change the button's click event handler
00775             // now the button really submits the order
00776             postData('checkOut.php',{'checkOut':'yes'});
00777         });
00778         $('#orderPrefs').slideDown(300);
00779 
00780         return false;
00781     });
00782 
00783     // user changes order preference, ajax-send it to the server
00784     $('#orderPrefs input:radio').change(function(){        
00785         thiss.startLoading();
00786         $.post('php/ajax/changePrefType.php',
00787             {
00788                 "name": this.name,
00789                 "value": this.value
00790             },
00791             function(){
00792                 thiss.stopLoading();
00793             }
00794         );
00795     });
00796 
00797     // user removes an item from the cart
00798     $('a.removeItemButton').click(function(){
00799         thiss.sendChange(this, 0);
00800         return false;
00801     });
00802 
00803     // change the radio button event when user clicks to whole table row
00804     $('table.prefTypeTable tr').click(function(){
00805         var radio = $(this).find('input:radio').get(0);
00806         if (radio.checked == false){
00807             radio.checked = true;
00808             $(radio).change(); // don't forget to fire the event
00809         }
00810         
00811     });
00812 }
00813 
00822 CartControls.prototype.sendChange = function(button, quantity){
00823     var thiss = this;
00824 
00825     // for user not to be able to submit the order now
00826     this.startLoading();
00827 
00828     // table row the button is in
00829     var tr = $(button).parents('tr').first();
00830 
00831     $.post('php/ajax/changeCart.php',
00832         {
00833             "id": button.name,
00834             "quantity": quantity
00835         },
00836         function(data){
00837             thiss.stopLoading();
00838             
00839             if (data == null){ // something bad has happened
00840                 window.location.reload(); // reload the page to "reset" javascript
00841                 return;
00842             }
00843             if (data.quantity == 0){ // item has been removed
00844                 // change the count in title of the page
00845                 $('#titleItemCount').html(data.itemCount);
00846                 if (data.itemCount == 0){ // nothing left in the cart
00847                    // remove everything
00848                    thiss.rightButton.remove();
00849                    $('table.cart, #orderPrefs').remove();
00850                    //display message 'nothing in cart';
00851                    $('div.cartInfo').removeClass('noDisplay');
00852                    return;
00853                 }
00854                 //something left in the cart, just hide the removed item
00855                 
00856                 //use div inner wrappers to do this, because td or tr don't
00857                 //have the height css property
00858                 tr.children('td').children('div').each(function(){
00859                     $(this).slideUp(300, function(){
00860                         tr.remove(); // remove the row when completed
00861                     });
00862                 });
00863             }else{ // just quantity changed, set the item prices and quantity
00864                 tr.find('input').val(data.quantity);
00865                 tr.find('td.price div').html(data.price + ',-');
00866                 tr.find('td.VATPrice div').html(data.VATPrice + ',-');
00867             }
00868             // set total prices
00869             // in case the cart is empty and the cart table deleted, nothing happens
00870             $('#totalPrice').html(data.totalPrice + ',-');
00871             $('#totalVATPrice').html(data.totalVATPrice + ',-');            
00872         },
00873         "json"
00874     );
00875 };
00876 
00878 CartControls.prototype.startLoading = function(){
00879     this.rightButton.hide();
00880     this.loading.show();
00881 };
00882 
00884 CartControls.prototype.stopLoading = function(){
00885     this.loading.hide();
00886     this.rightButton.show();
00887 };

00895 
00896 
00897     //toggling the form for logging in

00899 
00900 
00901 
00902 });
